title: Ep293 Tech Bro Crimes (San Francisco LIVE)
description:
This week, the gals bring you back in time and to San Francisco for a live show focused on the douche demographic of the Bay Area. Topics include company-branded Patagonias, a deeply problematic solution to homelessness, and an app for really mean people. Mix up a Tito's with soda, iron out your mission statement, and tune in for Tech Bro Crimes, live from San Francisco!

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
